TABLE.NAME: ltiservice_outcomestwo
TABLE.COMMENT: This file records the grade items created by the LTI Outcomes 2 service

FIELD.NAME: toolproxyid
FIELD.COMMENT: ID of the Tool Proxy instance.

FIELD.NAME: gradeitemid
FIELD.COMMENT: ID of the grade item instance

FIELD.NAME: activityid
FIELD.COMMENT: Activity ID of the grade item instance
